title: Charge inside hollow region of neutral metal

content.description: A charge +ùëÑ is inside a hollow region in an electrically neutral piece of solid metal, as shown above. The dashed line represents a Gaussian surface within the metal that completely encloses the hollow region.
content.question: At which of the three labeled points is the electric field equal to zero?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
